name: The Mocking of Christ
description: The Mocking of Christ; Niklaus Manuel Deutsch (Swiss, 1484 - 1530); about 1513 - 1514; Pen and black ink with white and gold highlights on red brown prepared paper; 31.1 × 21.6 cm (12 1/4 × 8 1/2 in.); 84.GG.663; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Mocking of Christ
medium: Pen and black ink with white and gold highlights on red brown prepared paper
